title: Malignant neoplasm: Overlapping lesion of brain and other parts of central nervous system
block: Malignant neoplasms of eye, brain and other parts of central nervous system
category: Malignant neoplasm of spinal cord, cranial nerves and other parts of central nervous system
inclusion: Malignant neoplasm of brain and other parts of central nervous system whose point of origin cannot be classified to any one of the categories C70-C72.5
exclusion: peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system
